text: MyFreeImplants is the largest website used by women to find donations, particularly from men, via crowdfunding for breast augmentation. The women frequently converse with their donors. ==Criticism== The site has been criticized by professional organizations including the British Association of Aesthetic Plastic Surgeons (BAAPS) for tasteless marketing and trivializing a significant surgical procedure. It has also been criticized for providing a platform for men to ask for sexual favors. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:American fundraising websites Category:Implants (medicine) Category:Internet properties established in 2006 Category:Plastic surgery
title: Myfreeimplants
